thread.title: Gun enthusiasts outraged over Youtube gun crackdown

title: Gun enthusiasts outraged over Youtube gun crackdown
text:
Gun enthusiasts outraged over Youtube gun crackdown 1:26am IST - 02:02 
While gun enthusiasts are incensed after Youtube tightened its policies on videos featuring firearms, one channel is spreading around its distribution, including to platforms like PornHub.
